items.name: Antique 18th Century Pocket Watch
items.short_description: Rare 18th-century pocket watch with a beautifully engraved silver case, classic Roman numeral dial, and original movement in working condition.
items.long_description: This rare 18th-century pocket watch is a stunning example of historical craftsmanship. The watch features a beautifully engraved silver case, showcasing intricate designs typical of its era. The Roman numeral dial adds a classic touch, while the original movement ensures it remains in working condition. This timepiece serves as both a functional accessory and a significant collector's item, reflecting the elegance and precision of 18th-century watchmaking. Condition: The pocket watch is in excellent working condition, with all components functioning as intended. The silver case shows minor signs of wear consistent with its age but remains in very good condition overall. The original movement has been maintained and is operational. Features include a silver case with intricate engravings, a classic Roman numeral dial, and the original movement ensuring authenticity and operational integrity. Provenance: From a private collection, previously owned by a notable watchmaker, adding historical significance to its impressive pedigree.

photos.alt_text: Front view of the antique 18th-century pocket watch showing the engraved silver case and Roman numeral dial.
Side view of the pocket watch, highlighting the intricate engravings on the silver case.

details.provenance: From a private collection, previously owned by a notable watchmaker.
details.authentication: Includes an appraisal certificate from a certified watchmaker, verifying authenticity and historical value.

auction_details.terms_and_conditions: No refunds. Buyer is responsible for insurance during shipping.
